We are open Monday to Friday - 48 weeks of the year (The Nursery is closed 1 week during Easter, 1 week in August, 1 day for Diwali New Year Day (Ankoot) and 1 week over Christmas)
We offer full day sessions from 8am to 6pm
The attendance sessions can be a mixture of morning, afternoon or full day sessions that best support your family's needs
Our fees depend on the specific childcare arrangements you require. Our prices include breakfast, mid morning snack, lunch, afternoon snack and tea where appropriate.

We are eligible to receive government funding so children can have 15 hours or 30 hours (dependant on eligibility) funded childcare per week (for 38 weeks of the year), starting from the term after their birthday. For further details, please Click Here.
All fees are payable monthly in advance by Direct Debit.
Please call us to arrange a visit and we will be happy to discuss our fee structure with you.
